Instruction: Preheat the oven to 375 degrees Fahrenheit.

Combine the sweet potatoes, carrots, and onion in a large mixing bowl. Add olive oil, salt, pepper, and garlic powder. Toss until the vegetables are evenly coated. Spread the mixture in a single layer on a baking sheet and roast in the oven at 400°F for 25-30 minutes, or until vegetables are tender and lightly browned.

Combine the brown sugar, flour, butter, and pecans in a small bowl and sprinkle over sweet potato mixture. Then bake in the preheated oven till thoroughly cooked with a touch of crispiness. Enjoy your delicious meal!
Preheat the oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
